name: Heron Data
all_locations: New York, NY, USA; London, England, United Kingdom
long_description: We use the latest advances in AI and LLMs to automate document-heavy workflows. We serve customers in financial services - banking, lending, insurance, lawyers and more. Our largest product automates underwriting for small business lenders and other specialty finance companies. We eliminate cumbersome manual processes and enable our customers to provide credit with much greater speed, precision, and fairness.
one_liner: We automate document-heavy workflows in financial services using AI
